name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented QA Engineer Trainee with hands-on experience in functional testing, regression testing, and mobile application testing. Proficient in creating and managing test documentation, utilizing tools like **Jira** for defect lifecycle management, and conducting thorough analyses of **APIs** with **Postman**. Familiar with the software development life cycle (SDLC) and software testing life cycle (STLC), adept at applying industry standards such as HTTP structure, methods, and status codes. 

Bringing over 10 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I possess a strong foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, allowing me to understand the technical aspects of applications from a developer's perspective. I have expertise in frameworks and technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, enabling a comprehensive approach to quality assurance. 

I am passionate about leveraging my technical background to enhance software quality and support teams in delivering high-performance software solutions across various domains, including healthcare and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Executed comprehensive functional testing and regression testing on healthcare and finance applications to ensure compliance with user requirements and high-quality standards.
•	Participated actively in the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), utilizing **Jira** for tracking defects and managing testing progress.
•	Contributed to test documentation, outlining test plans, cases, and scenarios, ensuring thorough and systematic coverage of all functionalities for **mobile applications** and web services.
•	Conducted manual QA procedures to identify discrepancies and defects within applications, facilitating prompt defect lifecycle management to enhance product reliability.
•	Performed API testing using **Postman** for RESTful services, validating HTTP structure, methods, status codes, and ensuring seamless data exchange between components.
•	Tested **Progressive Web Applications (PWA)** to ensure functionality, performance, and security across different devices and platforms.
•	Engaged in mobile application testing for both iOS and Android platforms, verifying user experience and performance metrics against defined standards.
•	Utilized testing tools and methodologies to enhance testing efficiency and effectiveness, contributing to the development of a structured testing approach.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to communicate testing outcomes and collaborate on defect resolution, promoting a shared vision for product quality.

Conducted **functional testing** and **regression testing** on financial platforms, ensuring seamless user experiences and reliable performance of applications developed using **React (18)** and **Vue 3**.
Developed and maintained **test documentation** to rigorously track the SDLC and STLC processes, utilizing tools like **Jira** for defect lifecycle management and test case management.
Executed manual QA processes to validate the functionality of microservices created using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, contributing to the overall quality assurance standards.
Tested various API integrations utilizing **Postman**, validating **HTTP methods**, response **status codes**, and ensuring compliance with the intended **HTTP structure** for operational efficiency.
Performed mobile application testing and **PWA testing** for banking systems, ensuring compatibility across devices and delivering quality assurance for end-users.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to provide QA support, address defects, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions integrated with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**.
Engaged in continuous learning in the defect lifecycle management processes and effective **test strategies** to adapt to evolving technologies and trends in the finance industry.

Conducted extensive **functional testing** and **regression testing** to ensure software quality and reliability throughout the software development life cycle (**SDLC**), adhering to industry standards and best practices.
Developed and maintained comprehensive **test documentation** using tools such as **Jira**, facilitating efficient communication and tracking of defects and features during the development process.
Evaluated mobile applications through **mobile application testing** and **PWA testing**, ensuring performance and compatibility across multiple devices and platforms, aimed at achieving an optimal user experience.
Executed API testing using **Postman**, validating service endpoints and ensuring responsive performance, which contributed to a **99% pass rate** in API calls during the testing phases.
Monitored and managed the **defect lifecycle management**,  maintaining detailed records of identified issues and their resolution status, with timely updates to stakeholders on critical **status codes** and responses.
Analyzed and documented **HTTP structure**, **HTTP methods**, and their respective capabilities to ensure comprehensive coverage of testing scenarios, enhancing overall application functionality and user interactions.
Gained familiarity with **Keitaro**, utilizing traffic arbitrage strategies to optimize reporting metrics and user engagement within the tested applications.
Facilitated communication during team meetings, providing insights on **test results** and proposing actionable improvements to streamline quality assurance efforts, yielding a **30% reduction** in bug report turnaround times.
